description: Returns an array of table names associated with the current account and endpoint. The output from ListTables is paginated, with each page returning a maximum of 100 table names.

nested_items.name: TableNames
nested_items.description: The names of the tables associated with the current account at the current endpoint. The maximum size of this array is 100.

nested_items.name: LastEvaluatedTableName
nested_items.description: The name of the last table in the current page of results. Use this value as the ExclusiveStartTableName in a new request to obtain the next page of results, until all the table names are returned.
